column4: hi all.. when I try to apt-get remove dovecot-core, I get messages like: "RTNETLINK answers: File exists", "invoke-rc.d: initscript dovecot, action "stop" failed." ... and then "E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (1)"... how can I remove dovecot package? thx
sudo stop dovecot && sudo /etc/init.d/dovecot start          then try removing the package again
